Query: UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'L\' as Ind , LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME as \'Ledger Name\', (CASE WHEN CLOSING < 0 THEN -1*CLOSING ELSE NULL END) DEBIT, (CASE WHEN CLOSING > 0 THEN CLOSING ELSE NULL END) CREDIT FROM (SELECT LED.LEDGER_NAME, LED.LEDGER_ID, LED.LEDGER_TYPE, LED.GROUP_ID, CAST( ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.CREDIT_AMOUNT),0),2) - ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.DEBIT_AMOUNT),0),2) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS CLOSING FROM $master_db.Ledger_Master LED LEFT OUTER JOIN $trans_db.TRANSACTION_HELPER TRANS ON LED.LEDGER_ID = TRANS.LEDGER_ID AND TRANS.VOUCHER_DATE >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND TRANS.VOUCHER_DATE <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') GROUP BY LED.LEDGER_ID)A WHERE CLOSING <>0 ORDER BY LEDGER_TYPE,GROUP_ID' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 23

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'V\' , Voucher_No, Voucher_Prefix, \'ContraVoucher\', Voucher_Date as \'Voucher Date\', (case when (select gmvalue from config_settings where gmkey = \'showPrefixInRegister\') = 1 then concat(Voucher_Prefix, \'-\', Voucher_No) else CAST(Voucher_No as UNSIGNED) end) as \'Voucher No\', (SELECT Ledger_Name FROM $master_db.Ledger_Master WHERE Ledger_ID= sim.Ledger_ID) Ledger, Total FROM $trans_db.Contra_Voucher_Main sim WHERE Voucher_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Voucher_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 83

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT 'V' , Voucher_No, Voucher_Prefix, 'RECEIPTVOUCHER', Voucher_Date as 'Voucher Date', (case when (select gmvalue from config_settings where gmkey = 'showPrefixInRegister') = 1 then concat(Voucher_Prefix, '-', Voucher_No) else CAST(Voucher_No as UNSIGNED) end) as 'Voucher No', (SELECT Ledger_Name FROM $master_db.Ledger_Master WHERE Ledger_ID= sim.Ledger_ID) 'Mode Of Pay', (SELECT Ledger_Name FROM $master_db.Ledger_Master WHERE Ledger_ID= (select ledger_id from receipt_voucher_details where voucher_no = sim.voucher_no and voucher_prefix = sim.voucher_prefix limit 1)) 'Ledger', Total FROM $trans_db.Receipt_Voucher_Main sim WHERE Voucher_Date >= str_to_date('$fromDateTime','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND Voucher_Date <= str_to_date('$toDateTime','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')', `display_options` = '{"Totals":[8], "Hide":[0,1,2,3], "width-list":[20,20,20,20,20], "align-list":[0,0,0,0,1], "print-cols":[4,5,6,7,8]}'  WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 49

INSERT INTO `ui_config` VALUES (150,'Room Types','PMS','Masters','PMSRT','SELECT \'PMSRT\',ROOM_TYPE_ID, TYPE_NAME as \'Room Type\', RATE, STD_OCC, MAX_OCC,GST_RATE, EXTRA_BED_RATE FROM ROOM_TYPE_MASTER ORDER BY RATE',NULL,'{ \"Hide\":[0,1,4,5,6,7], \"width-list\":[80,20], \"align-list\":[0,1], \"print-cols\":[1,2], \"stretch\":1}',NULL,NULL),(116,'Rooms','PMS','Masters','PMSRM','SELECT \'PMSRM\',ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, ( SELECT TYPE_NAME FROM ROOM_TYPE_MASTER RT WHERE RT.ROOM_TYPE_ID = RM.ROOM_TYPE_ID ) as \'Type\' FROM ROOMS_MASTER RM ORDER BY ROOM_NAME',NULL,'{ \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[50,50], \"align-list\":[0,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3], \"stretch\":0}',NULL,NULL),(117,'Bookings','PMS','Registers','RoomBooking','SELECT \'V\',Voucher_No,Voucher_Prefix,\'RoomBooking\',Booking_Date, (select ROOM_NAME from rooms_master rm where \"stretch\":0}',NULL,NULL),(118,'Checkins','PMS','Registers','RoomCheckins','SELECT \'V\',Voucher_No,Voucher_Prefix,\'RoomCheckins\',(select ROOM_NAME from rooms_master rm where `room_bookings` rb WHERE status = 3 and CheckIn_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') and CheckIn_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\', UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'V\',Voucher_No,Voucher_Prefix,\'RoomCheckins\',(select ROOM_NAME from rooms_master rm where rm.ROOM_ID=rb.Room_Name_ID) as Room,(select TYPE_NAME from room_type_master rtm where rtm.Room_Type_ID=rb.Room_Type_ID) Type ,`CheckIn_Date`,`Expected_CheckOut_Date` as \'Check Out\' FROM `room_checkins` rb WHERE status = 3 and CheckIn_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') and CheckIn_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\')' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 118

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'V\',Voucher_No,Voucher_Prefix,\'RoomCheckin\',(select ROOM_NAME from rooms_master rm where rm.ROOM_ID=rb.Room_Name_ID) as Room,(select TYPE_NAME from room_type_master rtm where rtm.Room_Type_ID=rb.Room_Name_ID) Type ,`CheckIn_Date`,`Expected_CheckOut_Date` as \'Check Out\', status FROM `room_checkins` rb WHERE Expected_CheckOut_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') and Expected_CheckOut_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\')' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 119
UPDATE `ui_config` SET `redirect_to` = '{\"redirect-to\":[{\"default\":{\"id\":14, \"keyList\":[{\"filter-type\":\"ledger\",\"var-name\":\"f1\", \"col-pos\":1}]}}]}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 90

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT Ind, ID , Name,   CAST( COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.DEBIT_AMOUNT),0) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS Debit,   CAST( COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.CREDIT_AMOUNT),0) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) Credit  FROM (select accGrp1.group_name Name, led.ledger_id, \'A\' as Ind,accGrp1.group_id as ID from $master_db.ledger_master led inner join (with recursive cte (group_id, group_name, parent_id, ledger_id) as ( select grp.group_id,grp.group_name,grp.parent_id, led.ledger_id from $master_db.ledger_master led left outer join account_groups grp on led.group_id = grp.group_id union all select p.group_id, p.group_name,p.parent_id, ledger_id from $master_db.account_groups p inner join cte on p.group_id = cte.parent_id ) select cte.group_name, cte.ledger_id, cte.group_id from cte where cte.parent_id = \'$f1\') accGrp1 on accGrp1.ledger_id = led.ledger_id union select led2.ledger_name Name, led2.ledger_id, \'L\' as ind,led2.ledger_id as ID from $master_db.ledger_master led2 where led2.group_id = \'$f1\') LED  LEFT OUTER JOIN $trans_db.TRANSACTION_HELPER TRANS  ON LED.LEDGER_ID = TRANS.LEDGER_ID  AND TRANS.voucher_date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') AND TRANS.voucher_date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\' ,\'%Y-%m-%d\') GROUP BY ID order by Ind, Name' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 90

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'V\' as Ind, \'\' RefNo, \'\' RefPrefix, RefType, min(VoucherDate) as \'Voucher Date\', \'\' as \'Voucher No\', RefType as \'Voucher Type\', (select round(sum(DebitAmount - creditAmount),2) from $trans_db.billwise_records where voucherNo = Ref.RefNo AND voucherType = Ref.RefType AND voucherPrefix = Ref.RefPrefix and LedgerId = \'$f1\' and Method_Of_Adj = \'ON ACC\' ) as \'Bill Amount\', round(SUM(COALESCE(DebitAmount,0)) -  SUM(COALESCE(CreditAmount,0)),2) as \'Balance Amount\'  FROM $trans_db.Billwise_Records Ref WHERE Ref.LedgerId = \'$f1\' AND Ref.VoucherDate <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND (Method_Of_Adj= \'ON ACC\' )  HAVING SUM(COALESCE(CreditAmount,0)) - SUM(COALESCE(DebitAmount,0)) <> 0 UNION SELECT \'V\' as Ind, RefNo, RefPrefix, RefType, min(VoucherDate) as \'Voucher Date\', RefNo as \'Voucher No\', RefType as \'Voucher Type\', (select round(sum(DebitAmount - creditAmount),2) from $trans_db.billwise_records where voucherNo = Ref.RefNo AND voucherType = Ref.RefType AND voucherPrefix = Ref.RefPrefix) as \'Bill Amount\', round(SUM(COALESCE(DebitAmount,0)) -  SUM(COALESCE(CreditAmount,0)),2) as \'Balance Amount\'  FROM $trans_db.Billwise_Records Ref WHERE Ref.LedgerId = \'$f1\' AND Ref.VoucherDate <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND (Method_Of_Adj<> \'ON ACC\' OR Method_Of_Adj IS NULL OR Method_Of_Adj = \'\') GROUP BY RefNo, RefType, RefPrefix HAVING SUM(COALESCE(CreditAmount,0)) - SUM(COALESCE(DebitAmount,0)) <> 0 ORDER BY 1' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 15

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT  Ind, ID, Name, (CASE WHEN CLOSING < 0 THEN -1*CLOSING  ELSE NULL END) Debit,   (CASE WHEN CLOSING > 0 THEN CLOSING  ELSE NULL END) Credit FROM  (SELECT Ind, LED.Name, LED.ID,   CAST( COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.CREDIT_AMOUNT),0) - COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.DEBIT_AMOUNT),0) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS CLOSING  FROM (select accGrp1.group_name Name, led.ledger_id, \'A\' as Ind,accGrp1.group_id as ID from $master_db.ledger_master led inner join (with recursive cte (group_id, group_name, parent_id, ledger_id) as ( select grp.group_id,grp.group_name,grp.parent_id, led.ledger_id from $master_db.ledger_master led left outer join account_groups grp on led.group_id = grp.group_id union all select p.group_id, p.group_name,p.parent_id, ledger_id from $master_db.account_groups p inner join cte on p.group_id = cte.parent_id ) select cte.group_name, cte.ledger_id, cte.group_id from cte where cte.parent_id = \'$f1\') accGrp1 on accGrp1.ledger_id = led.ledger_id union select led2.ledger_name Name, led2.ledger_id, \'L\' as ind,led2.ledger_id as ID from $master_db.ledger_master led2 where led2.group_id = \'$f1\') LED  LEFT OUTER JOIN $trans_db.TRANSACTION_HELPER TRANS  ON LED.LEDGER_ID = TRANS.LEDGER_ID  AND TRANS.VOUCHER_DATE <= \'$toDateTime\'  GROUP BY LED.ID)A  WHERE CLOSING <>0' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 17

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (151, 'Ledgerwise Sales Register', 'Finance', 'Reports', 'Finance', 'SELECT \'V\' , Voucher_No, Voucher_Prefix, \'SALESVOUCHER\',  Voucher_Date as \'Voucher Date\', (case when (select gmvalue from config_settings where gmkey = \'showPrefixInRegister\') = 1 then concat(Voucher_Prefix, \'-\', Voucher_No) else CAST(Voucher_No as UNSIGNED) end) as \'Voucher No\',  Total FROM $trans_db.Sales_Invoice_Main sim WHERE Voucher_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Voucher_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Ledger_Id = \'$f1\'', '{\"filter by\":[{\"var-name\":\"f1\",\"var-value\":\"ledger\"}],\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\",\"toDateTime\"]}', '{\"Totals\":[6], \"Hide\":[0,1,2,3], \"width-list\":[20,20,30,20], \"align-list\":[0,0,0,1], \"print-cols\":[4,5,6], \"stretch\":6}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '151', 'Ledgerwise Sales Register', 'Screen', '0', 'C|Reports', 'Finance', '0', '1')
UPDATE `ui_config` SET `redirect_to` = '{\"redirect-to\":[{\"default\":{\"id\":151, \"keyList\":[{\"filter-type\":\"ledger\",\"var-name\":\"f1\", \"col-pos\":1}]}}]}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 104

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'V\' , Voucher_No, Voucher_Prefix, \'PURCHASEVOUCHER\', Voucher_Date as \'Voucher Date\', (case when (select gmvalue from config_settings where gmkey = \'showPrefixInRegister\') = 1 then concat(Voucher_Prefix, \'-\', Voucher_No) else CAST(Voucher_No as UNSIGNED) end) as \'Voucher No\', (SELECT Ledger_Name FROM $master_db.Ledger_Master WHERE Ledger_ID= sim.Ledger_ID) Ledger, Total FROM $trans_db.Purchase_Invoice_Main sim WHERE Voucher_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Voucher_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 45

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT \'V\' , Voucher_No, Voucher_Prefix, \'PAYMENTVOUCHER\', Voucher_Date as \'Voucher Date\', (case when (select gmvalue from config_settings where gmkey = \'showPrefixInRegister\') = 1 then concat(Voucher_Prefix, \'-\', Voucher_No) else CAST(Voucher_No as UNSIGNED) end) as \'Voucher No\', (SELECT Ledger_Name FROM $master_db.Ledger_Master WHERE Ledger_ID= sim.Ledger_ID) Ledger, Total FROM $trans_db.Payment_Voucher_Main sim WHERE Voucher_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Voucher_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 48
UPDATE `ui_config` SET `filters` = '{\"filter by\":[{\"var-name\":\"f1\",\"var-value\":\"account_group\"}],\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\",\"toDateTime\"]}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 17

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (NULL, 'Salesman-wise Receipt Summary', 'Finance', 'Reports', 'Finance', ' select \'E\' as Ind, Salesman_ID, (select name from employee_details where _id = salesman_id) as SalesMan, sum(cr_amount) from receipt_voucher_details where ledger_id in ( select ledger_id from ledger_master where route_id = \'$f1\') and voucher_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') and voucher_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') group by salesman_id', '{\"filter by\":[{\"var-name\":\"f1\",\"var-value\":\"route\"}],\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\", \"toDateTime\"]}', '{\"Totals\":[3], \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[40,20], \"align-list\":[0,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '153', 'Salesmanwise Receipt Summary', 'Screen', '0', 'C|Reports', 'Finance', '25', '1')

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = ' SELECT \'V\' , Voucher_No, Voucher_Prefix, \'Stock Request\', Voucher_Date as \'Voucher Date\', (case when (select gmvalue from config_settings where gmkey = \'showPrefixInRegister\') = 1 then concat(Voucher_Prefix, \'-\', Voucher_No) else CAST(Voucher_No as UNSIGNED) end) as \'Voucher No\', (select godown_name from $master_db.godown where godown_id = to_location) as \'To Section\' FROM $trans_db.Stock_Request_Main sim WHERE Voucher_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Voucher_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 57

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (157, 'Brandwise Sales Report', 'Inventory', 'Reports', 'Inventory', 'Select \'B\' ,B._id, b.brand_name,sum(quantity) as Quantity, sum (subtotal) as amount from sales_invoice_details left join sales_inventory_items inv on inventory_item_id= inv.item_id join brands B on inv.brand_id = B._id where voucher_date>= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') and voucher_date<= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') group by B._id', '{\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\",\"toDateTime\"]}', '{\"Totals\":[3,4], \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[40,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '157', 'Brandwise Sales Reports', 'Screen', '0', 'C|Reports', 'Inventory', '20', '1')

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (158, 'Itemwise Sales By Bill', 'Inventory', 'Reports', 'Inventory', 'select \'I\' as Ind, inv.item_id, inv.item_name Item, sum(sales.quantity) Quantity, sum(sales.subTotal) Amount from $master_db.sales_inventory_items inv join $trans_db.sales_invoice_details sales on inv.item_id = sales.inventory_item_id join sales_invoice_main main on main.voucher_no = sales.voucher_no and main.voucher_prefix = sales.voucher_prefix where  cast(main.voucher_no as int) >= \'$f1\' and cast(main.voucher_no as int) <= \'$f2\' and voucher_prefix = \'$f3\' group by Item_Id', '{\"filter by\":[{\"var-name\":\"f1\",\"var-value\":\"from\"}, {\"var-name\":\"f2\",\"var-value\":\"to\"}, {\"var-name\":\"f3\",\"var-value\":\"prefix\"}]}', '{\"Totals\":[3,4], \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[40,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '158', 'Itemwise Sales By Bill', 'Screen', '0', 'C|Reports', 'Inventory', '18', '1')

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'select \'I\' as Ind, inv.item_id, inv.item_name Item, sum(sales.quantity) Quantity, sum(sales.subTotal) Amount from $master_db.sales_inventory_items inv join $trans_db.sales_invoice_details sales on inv.item_id = sales.inventory_item_id join sales_invoice_main main on main.voucher_no = sales.voucher_no and main.voucher_prefix = sales.voucher_prefix where cast(main.voucher_no as int) >= \'$f1\' and cast(main.voucher_no as int) <= \'$f2\' and main.voucher_prefix = \'$f3\' group by Item_Id' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 158

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (159, 'Itemwise Batch Report', 'Inventory', 'Reports', 'Inventory', 'SELECT min(Voucher_Date) Voucher_Date, ItemID, Batch_Name, round(SUM(balance),3) as Stock ,  Purchase_Cost, Selling_Price from (  SELECT Voucher_Date, Ref_No, Ref_Type, Ref_Prefix, ItemID, SKU_ID, Batch_No, Batch_Name, serial_no_from,serial_no_to, Dr_Qty - Cr_Qty as balance,  Purchase_Cost, Selling_Price,   Mfg_Date, Expiry_Date,  Cr_qty  FROM `item_batch_helper`  where itemId = \'$f1\' and Voucher_Date<= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') ) A group by  Batch_Name  HAVING round(sum(balance),3) <> 0  order by Voucher_Date', '{\"filter by\":[{\"var-name\":\"f1\",\"var-value\":\"item\"}],\"dateTime\":[\"toDateTime\"]}', '{\"Totals\":[3], \"Hide\":[1],  \"width-list\":[10,10,30,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,0,0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[0,2,3,4], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '159', 'Itemwise Batch Report', 'Screen', '0', 'D|Items', 'Inventory', '5', '1')

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT  Ind, ID, Name,  sum(Debit)  Debit,   sum(Credit)   Credit FROM  ( SELECT  Ind, ID, Name, (CASE WHEN CLOSING < 0 THEN (-1*CLOSING)  ELSE NULL END) Debit,   (CASE WHEN CLOSING > 0 THEN (CLOSING)  ELSE NULL END) Credit FROM  ( SELECT Ind, LED.Name, LED.ID,   CAST( COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.CREDIT_AMOUNT),0) - COALESCE(SUM(TRANS.DEBIT_AMOUNT),0) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS CLOSING  FROM (select accGrp1.group_name Name, led.ledger_id, \'A\' as Ind,accGrp1.group_id as ID from $master_db.ledger_master led inner join (with recursive cte (group_id, group_name, parent_id, ledger_id) as ( select grp.group_id,grp.group_name,grp.parent_id, led.ledger_id from $master_db.ledger_master led left outer join account_groups grp on led.group_id = grp.group_id union all select p.group_id, p.group_name,p.parent_id, ledger_id from $master_db.account_groups p inner join cte on p.group_id = cte.parent_id ) select cte.group_name, cte.ledger_id, cte.group_id from cte where cte.parent_id = \'$f1\') accGrp1 on accGrp1.ledger_id = led.ledger_id union select led2.ledger_name Name, led2.ledger_id, \'L\' as ind,led2.ledger_id as ID from $master_db.ledger_master led2 where led2.group_id = \'$f1\') LED  LEFT OUTER JOIN $trans_db.TRANSACTION_HELPER TRANS  ON LED.LEDGER_ID = TRANS.LEDGER_ID  AND TRANS.VOUCHER_DATE <= \'$toDateTime\'  GROUP BY LED.LEDGER_ID)A ) B WHERE debit <>0 or credit <> 0 group by id' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 17

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `Extras` = '[{\"widget-type\":\"QtMaterialFlatButton\", \"Layout\":\"filterLayout\", \"widget-id\":1, \"text\":\"Print All Ledgers \", \"action\":\"printAllLedgers\", \"widget-align\":\"AlignRight\"}]' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 17
UPDATE `ui_config` SET `redirect_to` = '{\"redirect-to\":[{\"default\":{\"id\":14, \"keyList\":[{\"filter-type\":\"ledger\",\"var-name\":\"f1\", \"col-pos\":1}]}}]}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 17
UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'select \'R\' as Ind, Route_id , Route_Name as \'Route\', Description as \'Description\' from $master_db.route_master' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 93

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'select \'V\', EntryId, \'\' as prefix, \'UsageEntry\' as vtype, Entry_Date \'Date\', (select Ledger_Name from Ledger_Master where Ledger_ID = Usage_Entry.Ledger_Id) as Type,  Reading, UsageValue as \'Usage\' From Usage_Entry where Entry_Date >= str_to_Date(\'$fromDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') and Entry_Date <= str_to_Date(\'$toDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\')' , `display_options` = '{\"Totals\":[7], \"Hide\":[0,1,2,3], \"width-list\":[60,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,0,1], \"print-cols\":[4,5,6,7], \"stretch\":0}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 167

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'Select \'UC\', _id, (select UOM_Name from uomlist where uom_id = baseUnit) as \'Base Unit\', (select UOM_Name from uomlist where uom_id = toUnit) as \'To Unit\', conValue as \'COnversion Rate\' from uom_conversion where itemID is null or length(itemID) = 0' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 65

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `display_options` = '{\"Totals\":[7], \"Hide\":[0,1,2,3], \"width-list\":[60,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,0,1], \"print-cols\":[4,5,6,7], \"stretch\":0}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 167
UPDATE `ui_config` SET `display_options` = '{\"Totals\":[5], \"Hide\":[0,1,2,3], \"width-list\":[20,20,30], \"align-list\":[0,0,1], \"print-cols\":[4,5,6]}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 168

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES ('5016', 'Godownwise Stock Report', 'PMS', 'Reports', 'PMS', 'select \'I\', itemId, (select item_name from Sales_Inventory_items where item_id = ItemID) as Item, sum(Laundry) as \'Stock in Laundry\', sum(Store) as \'Stock In Store\' from ( select itemId, case when godown = \'A2\' then sum(qty) end as \'Laundry\', case when godown = \'GODOWN\' then sum(qty) end as  Store from (select itemId, to_location as Godown, sum(Dr_Qty) as qty from transaction_item_helper where voucherDate <= str_to_Date(\'$toDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') group by ItemID, To_Location union all select ItemID, From_Location, -1*sum(Cr_Qty) from transaction_item_helper where  voucherDate <= str_to_Date(\'$toDateTime\', \'%Y-%m-%d\') group by ItemID, From_Location) A group by ItemId, godown) B', '{"dateTime\":[\"toDateTime\"]}', '{\"Totals\":[3,4], \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[40,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'select \'E\', employee_id,  Employee, worked_days as \'Worked Days\',  total_num_of_Days - worked_days as \'No.of Leaves Taken\',   OverTime from  ( SELECT a.Employee_Id, E.Name as Employee,  sum(case when a.Working_Hours >0 and HalfDay =0 then 1  when a.Working_Hours >0 and HalfDay = 1 then 0.5 else 0 end ) as worked_days ,  case when E.date_of_joining  >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') then datediff(str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\'), date_of_joining) +1 else  datediff(str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\'), str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\')) +1 end as total_num_of_days,  sum(a.Overtime) as OverTime  FROM Attendance_Details a JOIN Employee_Details E ON A.Employee_Id = E._id  WHERE Working_Day >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') and Working_Day <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') group by Employee_Id) X ', `display_options` = '{\"Hide\":[0,1],  \"width-list\":[30,20,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4,5], \"stretch\":0}' WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 71

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (180, 'Itemwise Sales By Salesman', 'Inventory', 'Reports', 'Inventory', 'select \'I\' as Ind, inv.item_id, inv.item_name Item, sum(sales.quantity) Quantity, sum(sales.subTotal) Amount from $master_db.sales_inventory_items inv join $trans_db.sales_invoice_details sales on inv.item_id = sales.inventory_item_id join sales_invoice_main main on main.voucher_no = sales.voucher_no and main.voucher_prefix = sales.voucher_prefix where  str_to_date(concat(main.Voucher_Date , substr(main.timestamp, 11,19)), \'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')>=str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')  AND str_to_date(concat(main.Voucher_Date , substr(main.timestamp, 11,19)), \'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') <=str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') and main.salesman_id = \'$f1\' group by Item_Id', '{\"filter by\":[{\"var-name\":\"f1\",\"var-value\":\"employee\"}],\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\",\"toDateTime\"], \"useTimeStamp\":true}', '{\"Totals\":[3,4], \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[40,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '180', 'Itemwise Sales By Salesman', 'Screen', '0', 'D|Items', 'Inventory', '2', '1')

UPDATE `ui_config` SET `query` = 'SELECT min(Voucher_Date) Voucher_Date, ItemID,Batch_No,Batch_Name,serial_no, round(SUM(balance),3) as Stock , Purchase_Cost, Selling_Price from ( SELECT Voucher_Date, Ref_No, Ref_Type, Ref_Prefix, ItemID, SKU_ID, Batch_No, Batch_Name, serial_no,serial_no_from,serial_no_to, Dr_Qty - Cr_Qty as balance, Purchase_Cost, Selling_Price, Mfg_Date, Expiry_Date, Cr_qty FROM `item_batch_helper` where itemId = \'$f1\' and Voucher_Date<= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d\') ) A group by Batch_No, Serial_No HAVING round(sum(balance),3) <> 0 order by Voucher_Date, Serial_No,Batch_No WHERE `ui_config`.`_id` = 159

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES ('250', 'Itemwise Sales Reports', 'Inventory', 'Reports', 'Inventory', 'select \'I\' as Ind, inv.item_id, inv.item_name_arabic Item, sum(sales.quantity) Quantity, sum(sales.subTotal) Amount from $master_db.sales_inventory_items inv join $trans_db.sales_invoice_details sales on inv.item_id = sales.inventory_item_id join sales_invoice_main main on main.voucher_no = sales.voucher_no and main.voucher_prefix = sales.voucher_prefix where str_to_date(concat(main.Voucher_Date , substr(main.timestamp, 11,19)), \'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\')>=str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND str_to_date(concat(main.Voucher_Date , substr(main.timestamp, 11,19)), \'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') <=str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') group by Item_Id', '{\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\",\"toDateTime\"], \"useTimeStamp\":true}', '{\"Totals\":[3,4], \"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[40,20,20], \"align-list\":[0,1,1], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4], \"stretch\":2}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '250', 'Itemwise Sales Report Arabic', 'Screen', '0', 'C|Reports', 'Inventory', '6', '1')

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '5019', 'Tables', 'Screen', '0', 'A|Masters', 'Inventory', '3', '1')

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES (NULL, 'Table Reservations', 'Inventory', 'Registers', 'Reservations', 'SELECT \'TRES\', `Reservation_id`,`Reservation_Date` as \'Date\',  (SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM TABLES_MASTER TM WHERE TM.TABLE_ID=TR.TABLE_ID) as \'Table Name\', `From_Time`, `To_Time`,(SELECT NAME FROM ADDRESS_BOOK AB WHERE AB.ADDRESS_ID=TR.CONTACT_ID) \'Name\',(SELECT PHONE_NUMBER FROM ADDRESS_BOOK AB WHERE AB.ADDRESS_ID=TR.CONTACT_ID) as \'Phone\', `PAX` FROM `Table_Reservations` TR WHERE Reservation_Date >= str_to_date(\'$fromDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') AND Reservation_Date <= str_to_date(\'$toDateTime\',\'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s\') ORDER BY 3,4', '{\"dateTime\":[\"fromDateTime\",\"toDateTime\"]}', '{\"Hide\":[0,1], \"width-list\":[50,50], \"align-list\":[0,0,0,0,0], \"print-cols\":[2,3,4,5,6,7], \"stretch\":0}', NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO `widget_master` (`_id`, `Widget_Id`, `Widget_Name`, `Category`, `Parent_Widget`, `Widget_Type`, `Modules`, `Priority`, `isConfiguredInDb`) VALUES (NULL, '5020', 'Table Reservations', 'Screen', '0', 'B|Transactions', 'Inventory', '3', '1')

INSERT INTO `ui_config` (`_id`, `ui_name`, `Module`, `ui_type`, `sub_type`, `query`, `filters`, `display_options`, `redirect_to`, `Extras`) VALUES ('6000', 'Measurements', 'Inventory', 'Masters', NULL, 'SELECT 'MS', `MEASUREMENT_ID`, `MEASUREMENT_NAME` FROM `measurement_master`', NULL, '{ "Hide":[0,1], "width-list":[50], "align-list":[0], "print-cols":[2], "stretch":2}', NULL, NULL)
